articles.author: James Olley
articles.title: Mesut Ozil leaves Arsenal: Where did it go wrong for 'Assist King' in Premier League? - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Mesut Ozil's arrival at Arsenal from Real Madrid in 2013 was supposed to be the start of a new era, yet he leaves as a pariah. What happened?
articles.content:
The "Assist King" has left the building as Mesut Ozil heads to boyhood club Fenerbahce after agreeing to terminate his Arsenal contract with six months remaining.
It wasn't supposed to be this way; … [+14483 chars]

articles.title: ‘Disappointed’ Crows to ponder appealing biggest AFLW ban ever handed to Ebony Marinoff - Fox Sports
articles.description: Adelaide will ponder lodging an appeal after star on-baller Ebony Marinoff was handed the longest AFLW suspension yet for the incident that left Giant Brid Stack with a fractured neck.
articles.content: Marinoff on Tuesday night was handed a three-match ban by the AFL tribunal for forceful front-on contact on Stack that occurred during the dying stages of the Crows practice match against the Giants … [+2486 chars]
